name: Apple Butter
keywords: apple cider, sugar, tart apples, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, fall, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the cider until it is reduced to two quarts. Add peeled, quartered apples and cook until very tender. Put the mixture through a colander and add sugar and spices as desired. Cook until thick, stirring to prevent burning. Pour into clean, sterilized jars and seal.
